name: Prometheus
description: Prometheus is an open-source, time-series database and monitoring system that is designed for handling large volumes of data and for querying data in real-time. It is particularly useful for handling large volumes of data and for querying data in real-time. Prometheus offers several advantages over traditional relational databases, including better performance, scalability, and flexibility. Additionally, Prometheus is well-suited for applications that require high availability, horizontal scalability, and flexible data models.
